1.title: Rousimar Palhares vs. Mike Massenzio UFC 142
1.plot: Winner of five of his last six, Rousimar Palhares is well on his way to the top of the middleweight division, but New Jersey's Mike Massenzio has every intention of putting a stop to the rise of "Toquinho" in their bout.

2.title: Jim Miller vs. Melvin Guillard UFC on FX
2.plot: Two very different fighters with a very similar gameplan- Who makes the first mistake- Melvin Guillard or Jim Miller?

3.title: Charles Oliveira vs. Eric Wisely UFC on FOX
3.plot: After making his name in the UFC at 155 pounds, Charles Oliveira is looking to make even more noise as a featherweight, and he'll test those waters tonight against veteran Eric Wisely, a five year pro who has battled it out with a host of quality foes.

4.title: Dustin Poirier vs. Max Holloway UFC 143
4.plot: Despite his youth, Max Holloway has shown off some very mature skills thus far, but now he takes a big step up against Dustin Poirier, one of the featherweight division's top rising stars, and when the bell rings, anything can happen.

5.title: Ivan Menjivar vs. John Albert UFC on FUEL
5.plot: Exciting bantamweights Ivan Menjivar and John Albert look to make their marks on the always-exciting division.

6.title: Vaughan Lee vs. Kid Yamamoto UFC 144
6.plot: Kid Yamamoto's wrestling and punching power gives him the ability to defeat any opponent who dares face him. Now, submission artist Vaughan Lee has taken that challenge, but when the bell rings, only one of these competitors will earn their first UFC win.

7.title: Martin Kampmann vs. Thiago Alves UFC on FX
7.plot: Two powerful welterweights known for their love of a brawl promise evolved game plans and an exciting finish.

8.title: Travis Browne vs. Chad Griggs UFC 145
8.plot: Hard-hitting Chad Griggs went from prospect to contender in Strikeforce. Now he's about to begin his assault on the UFC elite, but looking to give him a rude welcome is unbeaten Travis Browne, a rising star with KO power.

9.title: Nate Diaz vs. Jim Miller UFC on FOX 3
9.plot: Can bad boy Nate Diaz be the first person to stop fast-rising star Jim Miller?

10.title: Chan-Sung Jung vs. Dustin Poirier UFC on FUEL
10.plot: Two featherweights with finishing skills in their fists and submission games clash when powerhouse Dustin Poirier takes on the 'Korean Zombie' Chan Sung Jung.

11.title: Paul Sass vs. Jacob Volkmann UFC 146
11.plot: Jacob Volkmann may not be flashy, but he knows how to win. Unbeaten in a five fight run at 155 pounds, he takes on Paul Sass, a master of the triangle choke who is intent on being the one to break Volkmann's streak.

12.title: Stefan Struve vs. Lavar Johnson UFC 146
12.plot: Lavar Johnson is on a UFC knockout streak and submission specialists Stefan Struve is out to put a stop to it.

13.title: Erick Silva vs. Charlie Brenneman UFC on FX
13.plot: After two stellar performances at UFC events in Rio, blitzing Brazilian Erick Silva will get his biggest test yet against wrestling powerhouse Charlie "The Spaniard" Brenneman.

14.title: Dan Miller vs. Ricardo Funch UFC on FX
14.plot: Dan Miller has proven himself in the UFC as a top middleweight, but he promises to be even more dangerous at 170 pounds. Ricardo Funch's jiu-jitsu game is top notch, and he'll look to prove it tonight.

15.title: Rodrigo Damm vs. Antistavio Medeiros UFC 147
15.plot: When it came to tension on TUF Brazil, there was plenty of it outside the cage between Team Vitor's Rodrigo Damm and Anistavio Medeiros, making them two of the most compelling contestants. Now they get to settle their differences in the Octagon.

16.title: Alex Caceres vs. Damacio Page UFC on Fuel
16.plot: Known more for his personality during TUF 12, Alex Caceres appears to have found a home in the bantamweight division. But if he wants to show off even more of his game, he'll need to do it tonight against hard-hitting veteran Damacio Page.

17.title: Matt Riddle vs. Chris Clements UFC 149
17.plot: It's an exciting matchup as Chris Clements faces Matt Riddle in a riveting welterweight battle.

18.title: Joe Lauzon vs. Jamie Varner UFC on FOX
18.plot: Two fighters known for their exciting styles square off as WEC vet Jamie Varner and bonus collector Joe Lauzon get set to wow the crowd with an amazing fight.

19.title: Dennis Bermudez vs. Tommy Hayden UFC 150
19.plot: Ohio's Tommy Hayden is a welcome addition to a division that always delivers compelling fights, winning 8 of 9 bouts. Dennis Bermudez should be more of the same when it comes to top-notch action, as the TUF 14 finalist is always ready for a 3 round scrap.

20.title: Jon Jones vs. Vitor Belfort UFC 152
20.plot: The youngest champion in UFC history, Light Heavyweight Jon "Bones" Jones has taken out legend after legend. He now takes another heavyhitting lion, Vitor "Phenom" Belfort, who's off of a win over Anthony Johnson coaching the first season of TUF Brazil.

imdb.title: 2012 Submission of the Night
plot: The well rounded TUF 3 finalist, Dave Herman, takes on one of Brazil's legendary brothers, Antonio Rodrigo Nogueira, better known as Minotauro Nogueira.
